long_description: Get ready to throw some funk on the world! This psychedelic flying disc will be the hit of your next late-nite outing. Colored LEDs in the center of the disc illuminate fiber optics extending to the edge, allowing the disc to remain balanced for true flight. LEDs last an extremely long time; powered by a replaceable lithium coin-cell battery (included). Twist-on switch ensures lights stay on during use--LEDs cycle through pre-programmed color sequence. Durable plastic disc floats and is water resistant.
short_description: Get ready to throw some funk on the world! This psychedelic flying disc will be the hit of your next late-nite outing.
